text:
So not too long
ago, in December,
I got the best news ever.

I found out that I
was going to be a dad.

And that completely
shifted my mentality

and the essence of the question,
what's my purpose in life.

I want to be able to,
yes, pursue business,

be a leader in the
traditional way.
But I want to go beyond that.

I want to be able to
bring purpose and meaning

to the corporations
where I work for.

And at the same time, I want
to balance my personal life.

I want to be able to spend
time with Rafaela and my family

and help society in a way
that I would be helping
